price: Abufuo reyε ama (egya) no apae. Ԑberε biara a yεbεto (Kaafirfoͻ no mu) nnipa kuo bi agu mu no, (egya no) so Awεnfoͻ no bebisa wͻn sε: “Enti Kͻkͻbͻni biara amma mohͻ (amεbͻ mo kͻkͻ)?
arabic: تَكَادُ تَمَيَّزُ مِنَ ٱلۡغَيۡظِۖ كُلَّمَآ أُلۡقِيَ فِيهَا فَوۡجٞ سَأَلَهُمۡ خَزَنَتُهَآ أَلَمۡ يَأۡتِكُمۡ نَذِيرٞ

version.title: Ashanti Translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Ashanti by Sheikh Haroun Ismaeel

meta.transliteration: takādu tamayyazu mina al-ghayẓi kullamā ul'qiya fīhā fawjun sa-alahum khazanatuhā alam yatikum nadhīrun
